main event: An unidentified flying object was sighted on February 6, 1957, in High Springs, Florida. A bright light was observed in the sky, which approached rapidly, hovered briefly, then moved away at a 45-degree angle.
interesting points: The object was described as being circular and the size of a dime at arm's length,The sighting lasted approximately 10 seconds,No noise was heard during the observation,The investigating officer concluded it was not a star, plane, or any known astronomical object,The object appeared to be intelligently controlled.
sighted object: a bright circular light in the sky
